faqs.title: What is your return policy?
faqs.content: Our return policy allows returns within 30 days of purchase, provided the item is unused and in its original packaging.

faqs.title: Do you ship internationally?
faqs.content: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. Additional shipping fees may apply based on the destination.

faqs.title: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.content: We accept major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers. Please contact us for other payment options.

faqs.title: Can I get a refund?
faqs.content: Refunds are issued for eligible returns or cancellations as per our refund policy. Contact support for assistance.

faqs.title: How do I reset my password?
faqs.content: You can reset your password by clicking on 'Forgot Password' on the login page and following the instructions.

faqs.title: Where can I find user manuals?
faqs.content: User manuals are available in the 'Support' section of our website. You can download them for free.
